author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO RE-STRENGTHENS TO A CATEGORY 4 AS IT MOVES WEST-NORTHWESTWARD IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC...
summary: ...KIKO RE-STRENGTHENS TO A CATEGORY 4 AS IT MOVES WEST-NORTHWESTWARD IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 5:00 PM HST Sat Sep 06 the center of Kiko was located near 16.5, -142.4 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 946 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KIKO RE-STRENGTHENS TO A CATEGORY 4 AS IT MOVES WEST-NORTHWESTWARD IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 5:00 PM HST Sat Sep 06 the center of Kiko was located near 16.5, -142.4 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 946 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (CP4/EP112025)
